'Come, we climb the path. That is the way to Glimmerdeep, after all! Keep two eyes open for Orcs.'

'Hm... yes, it must be so. [placeholder], the survey expedition cannot continue. The risk is too great. I am sending the surveyors back. 

'But you and I? Well. A few may do what many may not. These Orcs spoke of a deal made, you said? I wonder, what could it be? 

'Stay close. If we become separated, use this whistle. To the Orcs it will sound like the call of a bird.'
